Intro.title: At the service of your legal peace of mind
Intro.description: We are dedicated to providing high-quality notarial services, backed by years of experience and a deep understanding of the Spanish legal framework.

About.title: About Us
About.subtitle: Your notary in the Hortaleza neighborhood. Explore our services and feel free to get in touch.

Services.notarialPowerDescription: A power of attorney is a legal document that allows one person to authorize another to represent and act on their behalf in specific or general matters.
Services.testamentaryDescription: A set of procedures before or after death, ensuring proper estate management and compliance with the testator's wishes.
Services.marriageContractsDescription: Agreements to establish the matrimonial economic regime, such as separation of property, registered in the Civil Registry.
Services.mortgageDescription: The process of formalizing mortgages, including signing transparency acts and loan contracts in accordance with current regulations.
Services.condominiumDissolutionDescription: Dissolution of co-ownerships, redistributing properties and compensating co-owners through notarial agreements.
Services.saleDescription: Notarized sales ensure secure transactions and facilitate property registration. The buyer typically chooses the notary office.
Services.donationsDescription: Formalization of gifts of movable or immovable property, with tax implications depending on the type and recipient of the donation.
Services.nationalityDescription: Procedure to swear Spanish nationality before a notary, a key step to obtaining a Spanish ID and passport.
Services.manifestationsDescription: Notarial documents that record declarations or certify facts, useful in legal or administrative procedures.
Services.signatureLegitimationDescription: The notary certifies the authenticity of a signature or issues certified copies of original documents.
